title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing Branch/PR/Rebase links
description: Remove the Branch, PR created and ready for development, and Rebase links from the Development Task interface to create a cleaner, more focused user experience
iWant: to simplify the Development Task interface by removing unnecessary Branch, PR, and Rebase links
soThat: I can provide a cleaner, more focused task management experience without Git workflow distractions
acceptanceCriteria: System removes Branch link from Development Task interface
System removes 'PR created and ready for development' link from task view
System removes Rebase link from Development Task interface
Development Task interface maintains core functionality without removed links
UI layout adjusts properly after link removal with no visual artifacts
User interface remains intuitive and responsive after simplification
All existing task management features continue to work as expected
Changes do not break any dependent workflows or integrations
technicalNotes: Focus on removing specific UI elements while preserving core task functionality. Ensure responsive layout after element removal.
